sum get balances of addresses
desc 50 credits per api call
get balances of fungible tokens erc20 nfts erc721 and erc1155 or multitokens erc1155 only for a specific wallet address on the following blockchains

celo  celo / celotestnet
ethereum  ethereum / ethereumsepolia
bnb binance smart chain  bsc / bsctestnet
polygon  polygon / polygonmumbai

to get started

provide a chain name and commaseparated list of addresses our api will return balances of each token along with further information such as its type id and more
aside from relevant information about each token and its balance the response also contains metadata they can however be excluded by setting excludemetadata to true
if not specified the api returns balances for all supported types of tokens fungible tokens nft multitokens but you can also choose to filter specific tokentypes
